INFORMATION: 

ESET Smart Security uses security in the cloud and multiple layers of detection to eliminate threats and stop potential attacks, providing maximum protection while you work, surf the Internet, play or exchange data using removable media. 

Security suite all in one 

ESET Smart Security 5 keeps your PC or laptop safe with intelligent multi-layer protection, combining a proven antivirus, antispyware, firewall, anti-rootkit and antispam capabilities. 

Next-generation security 

The new generation of computer security offers a great set of features, usability enhancements and new developments in analysis technology to protect your online life. 

Improve your defenses 

We have created a security solution for high performance against all Internet threats and to protect your personal data and important information either online or on your computer. Bring the security of your computer to a whole new level. 

Key features and benefits. 

ESET Live Grid (cloud-based Reputation) NEW 
It offers real time protection against Internet threats and risks in social networking. 

Parental Control NEW 
Protect your family from offensive Web content to block different categories of pages. 

Intelligent Detection 
Advanced Heuristic detection is unseen malware, protecting you from unknown threats and neutralizing them before they cause any damage. 

Smart Firewall 
New and improved firewall that prevents access to your system from unauthorized users to steal personal data. 

Improved Spam 
Perfectly integrated in ESET Smart Security, the antispam module has been fully optimized for a higher level of filtering accuracy. 

Improved removable device control NEW 
Automatically scans all USB drives, memory cards and CD or DVD. Blocks removable devices by type, manufacturer, size and other characteristics. 

Advanced Functionality NEW HIPS 
For true geeks: now you can customize the behavior of the system in more detail, specifying rules in the system registry, active processes, programs and fine-tune your security needs. 

Game Mode NEW 
Postpone all notices, updates or other activities that consume system resources for games or other activities in full screen work better. 

Optimized procedure for starting NEW 
Do not expect to complete the download of the signature database. ESET Smart Security 5 allows you to start work immediately after startup, without compromising safety.
